login.title: Login Form
login.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Dream Home! You are now logged in.

footer.app_description: We will send you a link, open on your phone to download the app.

registration.otpSend: We Have Sent Code To Your Email 6 Numbers As Long
registration.welcome: Welcome to dream home. Please enter the OTP sent to your email.

what_we_do.title: What We Do ?
what_we_do.description: We connect homeowners with trusted professionals for home repair and improvement. From plumbing to painting, our platform ensures fast, reliable, and hassle-free service. Whether it's a small fix or major work, we bridge the gap efficiently.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are ?
who_we_are.description: We are a passionate team committed to simplifying home maintenance for everyone. Using innovative technology, we match clients with vetted experts. Our goal is to provide reliable services that build trust and long-term relationships.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: Our mission is to make finding reliable home repair experts simple and stress-free. We focus on quality, trust, and customer satisfaction. By saving your time and effort, we aim to deliver the best home maintenance experience.

contact_section.contact_description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or want to book a service, feel free to reach out. Our team is always ready to assist you.

notifications.commentedOn: Commented on your post you created about
notifications.YouHaveSent: You Have Sent A Review Request.

uploadPost.title: Upload A Post
uploadPost.description: If you have an issue at home, you can upload a post describing the problem.
uploadPost.noteContent: Only workers from the relevant department (e.g., plumbing, electricity, etc.) will be able to view your issue. For example, if your problem is related to plumbing, only plumbing workers will see it.

messagesAndNotifications.title: Messages and Notifications
messagesAndNotifications.description: You can check your private messages and see which workers are requesting your review. Only rate workers who have actually completed a job for you.
messagesAndNotifications.noteContent: If a worker asks for a review without doing any work, do not provide a rating.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: You can switch between dark and light mode, change your preferred language, update your name, and log out of your account.
settings.noteContent: Make sure to save your settings to keep your preferences updated.

serviceDetails.errorMessage: No employees found for this service!

settings.updateProfileHint: Hint: Updating your profile helps build trust with customers and enhances your credibility.
settings.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?

myprofile-emp.browse_projects_desc: As a worker, you can browse available projects in your department and check details to submit a suitable offer.
myprofile-emp.browse_projects_note: You can only browse projects that belong to your department.
myprofile-emp.chats_desc: As a worker, you can view your private messages and stay connected with your clients.
myprofile-emp.chats_note: Your private messages are confidential and only visible to you and the sender.
myprofile-emp.notifications_desc: As a worker, you can view review requests, see who accepted your reviews, and check replies to your comments.
myprofile-emp.notifications_note: Notifications help you stay updated with all activity related to your interactions and tasks.
myprofile-emp.profile_desc: As a worker, you can view and manage your profile information, including your skills, experience, and account settings.
myprofile-emp.profile_note: Your profile is how clients get to know you—make sure it's always up to date.

reviews.noReviews: This user has no reviews yet!

not-found.p: Or The Page May Have Been Removed

dashboard.uploadPostDescription: As a client, you can upload a post describing your issue, and only workers in the relevant category will be able to view and respond to it.
dashboard.uploadPostNote: Make sure to choose the right category so your post reaches the right experts.
dashboard.chatsDescription: As a client, you can view and manage your private messages with workers, ask questions, and track project discussions.
dashboard.chatsNote: Your chats are private and only visible to you and the worker you're speaking with.
dashboard.notificationsDescription: As a client, you can track review requests on your posts, see which workers interacted with your issues, and follow up on replies.
dashboard.notificationsNote: Notifications keep you informed about all activity related to your posts and communication with workers.
dashboard.profileDescription: As a client, you can view and manage your profile details, track your activity history, and keep your account information up to date.
dashboard.profileNote: Your profile shows all your interactions, posts, and updates—keep it organized and current.
